title: Brooklyn Beckham's ex Hana Cross joins new beau Nasser Alfallah at Demi Lovato's Halloween party
text:
She narrowly avoided a run-in with ex Brooklyn Beckham at Paris Hilton's star-studded bash earlier in the week.

But Hana Cross appeared to put the potentially awkward incident behind her as she attended Demi Lovato's Halloween party with her new boyfriend Nasser Alfallah at Hyde in Los Angeles on Saturday evening.

The model, 22, exuded punk rock chic in a black crop top and pinstripe trousers as she left the venue with her beau Nasser, 19.

Moving on: Brooklyn Beckham's ex Hana Cross (L) attended Demi Lovato's Halloween party with her new boyfriend Nasser Alfallah (R) at Hyde in Los Angeles on Saturday evening

Maintaining her edgy appearance, the stunner tied in her look with a pair of monochrome canvas trainers by Converse and a selection of silver necklaces.

Hana intensified the beauty of her green eyes with heavily-applied eyeliner, and wore her tresses in loose waves.

Her partner Nasser looked equally stylish in a satin shirt, camo print trousers and a baseball cap.

Quirky fashion sense: The model, 22, exuded punk rock chic in a black crop top and pinstripe trousers, teamed with a pair of rugged trainers

Haunting: Host of the evening Demi, 27, transformed into Pennywise in a white tutu and ruffle corset

Their outing comes after David and Victoria Beckham's eldest child Brooklyn, 20, faced a near-certain run-in with his ex Hana when they attended the same Halloween party in Beverly Hills.

To make matters all the more awkward for the former flames, Hana arrived at the soirée with Nasser.

As the gathering got underway, Hana and Nasser shared snaps of themselves partying in costume on Instagram, while Brooklyn kept his night of revelry off social media after making a low-key arrival with a bandanna tied around his face.

Close call: Their outing comes after David and Victoria Beckham's eldest child Brooklyn, 20, faced a near-certain run-in with his ex Hana when they attended the same Halloween party

The social media sensation's new love interest was recently revealed by MailOnline to be Nasser, who is a Loyola Marymount University student in Los Angeles and is originally from Kuwait.

The brunette beauty's new partner is the younger brother of Mick Jagger's ex Noor Alfallah.

Hana dated Brooklyn for nine months but became known for having several high-profile arguments in public, before splitting earlier this year.
description: The model and former girlfriend of Brooklyn, 22, attended Demi Lovato's Halloween party with her new boyfriend Nasser, 19, at Hyde in Los Angeles on Saturday evening.
